DOC.brief_summary: The study aim investigate difference survival trajectory hospital variability myocardial infarction ( MI ) mortality rate UK Sweden .
DOC.brief_title: MI Mortality Risk Between-hospital Risk Variation United Kingdom Sweden
DOC.detailed_description: Limited evidence available compare hospital level care reference mortality risk country , due scarce availability nationwide coronary heart disease data . The demographic medical expenditure percentage comparable United Kingdom Sweden ; however , in-hospital case-fatality rate within 30 day admission acute myocardial infarction great UK Sweden ( 6.3 % versus 2.9 % ) ( OECD , 2009 ) . To investigate discrepancy , current study aim compare mortality risk difference associate explanatory factor two country . Results study contribute myocardial infarction care implementation UK Sweden . The UK Myocardial Ischaemia National Audit Project ( MINAP ) Register Information Knowledge Swedish Heart Intensive care Admissions ( RIKS-HIA ) quality national registry currently available acute coronary syndrome . Using data MINAP RIKS-HIA , propose investigate ( 1 ) survival trajectory reference patient myocardial infarction ( 2 ) hospital variability myocardial infarction mortality rate UK Sweden , adjust important patient-level hospital-level covariates .
DOC.criteria: Patients age 30 year old hospital admission acute myocardial infarction . Admission period range 1st January , 2004 31th December , 2008 . Patients miss data admission time and/or primary outcome .
